text: To Him all the prophets bear witnessPresumably the prophets all bear witness to the Messiah in some way. that through His nameI take “through His name” to mean something like ‘because of His identity’ as Messiah and Jehovah the Son. everyone who believes into Him will receive forgiveness of sins.”This was the crucial bit of information they were waiting for, what they had to do to be saved. The minute Peter said, “believe into Jesus”, they did! And the Holy Spirit came upon them! Believe “into” not “in”—a change of location is involved, from being outside to being inside, which requires commitment.
